survey_brief: This survey aims to understand HR professionals' adoption, satisfaction, and challenges with AI-powered recruitment tools.

questions.question_text: Which of the following AI-powered recruitment tools does your organization currently use? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-select. Include 'Other' option if needed for comprehensive responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkbox). Ensure 'None of the above' deselects other options if selected.

script.question_text: Which of the following AI-powered recruitment tools does your organization currently use? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your primary AI recruitment tool?
questions.routing_logic: Show if Q1 ≠ 'None of the above'
questions.client_notes: 5-point Likert scale with neutral midpoint. Include N/A for respondents who haven't used tools.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE (radio buttons). Randomize order except for N/A.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your primary AI recruitment tool?
script.routing_logic: Show if Q1 ≠ 'None of the above'

questions.question_text: What are the biggest challenges your organization faces when implementing AI recruitment tools? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Limit to 3 selections. Include open-text 'Other' option with character limit.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with max 3 selections. Add open-text field when 'Other' is selected.
